title: SRAM Red Adds ‘Oil Slick’ Chain & Cassette, Plus 4-Battery AXS Charger!
content:
The limited-edition Rainbow finish comes to the road with this SRAM Red cassette and chain, plus a new four-slot charger for AXS batteries.

The post SRAM Red Adds ‘Oil Slick’ Chain & Cassette, Plus 4-Battery AXS Charger! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
